text: Christopher Pell Liddell (born 24 April 1958) is a New Zealand-born American businessman and philanthropist. He serves in the Executive Office (the White House) of the President of the United States, Donald Trump, as the Assistant to the President for Strategic Initiatives. Liddell has been the Vice Chairman and Chief Financial Officer (CFO) of General Motors (GM) and CFO of Microsoft, Senior Vice President and CFO of International Paper, and CFO of William Morris Endeavor (WME/IMG). ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:American philanthropists Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:New Zealand businesspeople Category:American civil servants
title: Chris Liddell
